name: PENDING F5 - BIG IP Identity Provider (SAML)
title: PENDING F5 - BIG IP Identity Provider (SAML)
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1079967761 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

We do not have experience with that solution but there is documentation from Okta about how to set it up. (Okta and F5 have a partnership)

https://support.okta.com/help/s/article/Okta-Integration-Guide-for-Single-Sign-On-with-F5-BIG-IP-APM-as-SAML-IdP#overview
